name: .STARC
summary: Learn about .STARC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open STARC files with Story Architect in Windows, macOS, and Linux. To open a STARC file, click the Main Menu (three-line hamburger icon) and then select Open story.
Story Architect can convert STARC files to other file types, including the following formats:

images.alt: Screenshot of a .starc file in Story Apps Story Architect 0.7
images.caption: STARC file open in Story Apps Story Architect 0.7
